channel.title: Brand Recommendations on Dinis Peixoto
channel.description: Recent content in Brand Recommendations on Dinis Peixoto

item.title: Brand Recommendations - TF-IDF
item.description: I have been trying to learn Machine Learning for quite some time now. The main motivation for this was the fact that, at FARFETCH, I work really close to a data science team and wanted to get a grasp of the main challenges that they have to face on a daily basis. It all started with a couple of online courses. The thing with these courses is that you get to learn a lot of cool stuff supported with step-by-step tutorials, but I never took some time to actually build something on my own, that tackles a real issue that I’m facing.
